lines.text:
[after trying to shoot Ben]
Advantage here!
You're not thinking, Ben. I'm a lawyer. I have influence and I have money. Do you have any idea what they'll do to you for killing that old man and mutilating the only witness - a cripple?
You're no more a cripple than I am.
I tried to tell you. You could have ten thousand dollars now. Look what you've got.
You're really enjoying this aren't you?
I think you'd better postpone your trip to New York for a couple of days. In fact, I think you'd better get yourself a lawyer.
Making people believe things is my job. I'm very good at it.
